(Simplified: 柽)
Chinese Definition:
①(檉柳)落葉灌木，老枝紅色，葉像鱗片，花淡紅色，有時一年開花三次，結蒴果。全樹耐鹼抗旱，適於造防沙林。亦稱“三春柳”、“紅柳”。
(Simplified: 柽)

檉字的基本解释

檉
chēng
见“柽”。

檉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chēng］
［《廣韻》丑貞切，平清，徹。］
“柽1”的繁体字。
(1)木名。即柽柳。
(2)古城名。春秋宋邑。故址在今河南省淮阳县西北。公元前659年楚伐郑，鲁僖公与齐桓公、宋桓公、郑文公、邾人会于此。参阅《春秋·僖公元年》。

檉字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檉； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第18
【唐韻】丑貞切【集韻】【韻會】癡貞切【正韻】丑成切，?音頳。【說文】河柳也。【詩·大雅】其檉其椐。【爾雅翼】檉葉細如絲，婀娜可愛，天之將雨，檉先起氣以應之，故一名雨師，而字从聖。　又【酉陽雜俎】涼州有赤白檉。　又檉樹，一年三秀。【本草衍義】謂之三春柳。　又【張衡·南都賦註】檉似柏而香，今檉中有脂，號檉乳。　又【詩疏廣要】檉非獨知雨，又能負霜雪。大寒不凋，有異餘柳。【梁江淹·檉頌】木貴冬榮，檉實寒色。　又地名。【春秋·僖元年】公會齊侯、宋公、鄭伯、曹伯、邾人于檉。

Tamarisk
Basic explanation of words
Tamarisk
chēng
See "Tama".
Tamarisk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chēng]
["Guangyun" is ugly, pure, clear and thorough. ]
Traditional characters for "柽1".
(1) Wooden name. Namely Tamarix.
(2) The name of the ancient city. Spring and Autumn Song Yi. The former site was in the northwest of Huaiyang County, Henan Province. In 659 BC, the Chu defeated Zheng, and Lu Xi Gong, Qi Huan Gong, Song Huan Gong, Zheng Wengong, and Chu people gathered here. See "Spring and Autumn·Xi AD".
Tamarisk
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　柽; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Ugly Zhenqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Crazy Zhenqie [Zheng Yun] Ugly into a cut,? [Said the text] He Liu Ye. 【Poetry·Daya】Its tamarisk. [Erya Wing] Tamarix leaves are as thin as silk, graceful and lovely, the sky will rain, and Tamari first gets angry to respond to it, so he is a rain teacher, and the word is from the holy.　[Youyang Miscellaneous Cu] There is a red and white tamarisk in Liangzhou.　Tamashu again, three shows a year. [Materia Medica Yanyi] Said the three spring willow.　[Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu Note] Tamarisk is like cypress and fragrant. Today, there is fat in the tamarisk, and the name is tamarisk.　[Poetry Sparse and Guangyao] Tame is not alone in knowing the rain, but also able to bear frost and snow. The big cold does not wither, but there are different willows. [Liang Jiangyan·Song of Tamarisk] Mu Guidongrong, the color of Tamarisk is cold.　Also place name. [Spring and Autumn·Xi First Year] The guild was Qihou, Song Gong, Zheng Bo, Cao Bo, and Lu Renyu Yu.
